examples: It is about 76 kilos in weight.
Los plátanos se venden por peso.
In the wild, this fish can reach a weight of 5lbs.
En la naturaleza, este pez puede alcanzar un peso de 5 libras.
She is trying to lose weight (= become less heavy and less fat).
Ella está tratando de perder peso (= volverse menos pesada y menos grasa).
